catalogitems.name: Strawberry
catalogitems.description: Bursting with sweetness and vibrant red color, our strawberries are the epitome of summer. Enjoy them fresh as a guilt-free snack, sliced atop desserts, or blended into smoothies for a refreshing treat.

catalogitems.name: Raspberry
catalogitems.description: Sweet and soft, our raspberries are packed with bold flavor and essential nutrients. Add them to breakfast parfaits, bake them into muffins, or simmer them into a homemade jam for a burst of fruity goodness.

catalogitems.name: Blueberry
catalogitems.description: Plump and juicy, our blueberries are nature's antioxidant powerhouse. Whether sprinkled over pancakes, folded into muffin batter, or enjoyed by the handful, these blue gems are a delicious addition to any meal.

catalogitems.name: Physalis
catalogitems.description: Sweet with a hint of tartness, our physalis fruits are encased in delicate paper husks for a unique presentation. Enjoy them as a decorative garnish, dipped in chocolate for a gourmet treat, or mixed into fruit salads for added texture.

catalogitems.name: Blackberry
catalogitems.description: Juicy and big, our blackberries are bursting with deep, rich flavor. Enjoy them fresh on their own, mixed into yogurt or oatmeal, or baked into pies and cobblers for a taste of summer's bounty.

catalogitems.name: Mulberry
catalogitems.description: Sweet and succulent, our mulberries are reminiscent of childhood summers spent picking fruit from the tree. Enjoy them straight from the bush, sprinkled over cereal, or blended into smoothies for a nutritious boost.
